### IBM Spectrum for RCMP Tender Notification

#### Solicitation Number: BPM020205/24692

#### Published: December 4, 2023
#### Closing Date: December 18, 2023 (12:00 AM)

The Government of Canada, through the Shared Services Canada (SSC) entity, invites bids for the provision of IBM Spectrum for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

### Overview
----------------

IBM Spectrum is a comprehensive software solution that provides enterprise-level document management, email management, and network services.

### Solicitation Details
-----------------------

*   Solicitation Number: BPM020205/24692
*   Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Category: Goods and Services
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not Available
*   Expected Contract End Date: Not Available

### Evaluation Criteria
----------------=======

Evaluation of proposals will be based on the following criteria:

*   Technical and Functional Requirements
*   Price

### Trade Agreements
--------------------

This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity
---------------------------

*   Canada (Nationwide)
*   Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
